title: Color Tanru Practice
goal: Practice combining colors with objects in tanru.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Color recall:

blue → ?     green → ?
red → ?      black → ?
yellow → ?   white → ?

(Answers: blanu, crino, xunre, xekri, pelxu, blabi)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
clani x1 is long in dimension x2 by standard x3 long
tordu x1 is short in dimension x2 by standard x3 short

Color + Object Combinations

Practice all six colors with various objects:

Tanru Meaning
blanu karce blue car
xunre zdani red house
pelxu plise yellow apple
crino cukta green book
xekri mlatu black cat
blabi gerku white dog

Multiple Descriptors

You can chain modifiers:

barda blanu karce

Big blue car. (Both barda and blanu modify karce.)

cmalu xunre mlatu

Small red cat.

Color Tanru in Sentences

mi ponse la blanu karce

I own the blue car.

la .alis. cu nelci la crino plise

Alice likes the green apple.

ti clani xekri pencil

This is a long black pencil.

Key Point

Colors work like any modifier — they go left of the noun they describe.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Color + Object

Create tanru:

  1. red apple → ?
  2. green cat → ?
  3. white book → ?
  4. black house → ?
Answers
  1. xunre plise
  2. crino mlatu
  3. blabi cukta
  4. xekri zdani

Exercise 2: Full Sentences

Translate:

  1. I see a blue dog.
  2. Bob owns a red car.
  3. This is a yellow house.
  4. Alice likes the white cat.
Answers
  1. mi viska la blanu gerku
  2. la .bob. cu ponse la xunre karce
  3. ti pelxu zdani
  4. la .alis. cu nelci la blabi mlatu

Exercise 3: Use clani/tordu

Translate:

  1. long car → ?
  2. short book → ?
  3. This is a long blue car. → ?
Answers
  1. clani karce
  2. tordu cukta
  3. ti clani blanu karce

items.text: This is a long blue car. → ?

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I have a red apple." → mi ponse la xunre plise
  2. "The green book is big." → la crino cukta cu barda
  3. "This is a long white car." → ti clani blabi karce

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
clani x1 is long in x2 by x3 long
tordu x1 is short in x2 by x3 short

Color summary (6):

Lojban English
blanu blue
xunre red
pelxu yellow
crino green
xekri black
blabi white

You practiced combining all six colors with objects. Colors work as left-modifiers in tanru.
